content: क्षप् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (क्षपति-ते, क्षपित) To fast, to be abstinent; <ls>Ms. 5. 69.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} or {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (क्षपयति-ते, क्षपित) {@--1@} To throw, send, cast. {@--2@} To miss.
क्षप् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Night. {@--2@} A measure of time. {@--3@} Darkness. {@--4@} Water.
